abstract: With business slowing and every dollar important to their bottom line, some merchants are pushing for changes.
snippet: With business slowing and every dollar important to their bottom line, some merchants are pushing for changes.
lead_paragraph: Small merchants have long chafed at the fees they must pay banks every time a customer swipes a debit or credit card. But now, with business slowing and every dollar important to their bottom line, some merchants are pushing for changes.

headline.main: Small-Business Owners Lobby to Cut Credit Card Fees
headline.print_headline: Small Merchants Lobby To Cut Credit Card Fees
